abstract: The medical literature is rife with explanations for yawning, but one has gained substantial ground in recent years: This mysterious habit may help regulate brain temperature.
snippet: The medical literature is rife with explanations for yawning, but one has gained substantial ground in recent years: This mysterious habit may help regulate brain temperature.

headline.main: Really? The Claim: Yawning Cools the Brain
headline.print_headline: The Claim: Yawning cools the brain.
